reasoning: Umbrella term for alpha and beta thalassemia. Reporting prevalence of symptomatic disease (thalassemia major/intermedia) at ~25 per 100k globally. Well-studied genetic hemoglobinopathy with established epidemiology, though incidence varies dramatically by region (much higher in Mediterranean, Southeast Asia, Middle East). Carrier prevalence is much higher (~1500-3000 per 100k).
source: WHO guidelines on thalassemia and hemoglobinopathies
